name: Legions of Ashworld
description: Legions of Ashworld is a turn-based war-game, which brings a sense of adventure to strategic war-gaming with its first-person view of an open world environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A fun game harking back to the classic RPG / Strategy games of yore. Very polished, fun and challenging.

At this new discounted price, sure, I would recommend it. It's mostly 10-12 hours of decent strategy, though, given the low resource feature of the game, they could have worked a little more on AI, game mechanics and in game depth. A good step up from old Lords of Midnight though.
